title: In
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: The enthusiastic monkey can't resist jumping into everything--the boat, the grass, the mud, and finally the bathtub. Humorous illustrations provide support for new vocabulary, and young readers will enjoy the monkey's antics.
